Review_title: "Sarkari naukri [Data mining=Null], [Development=0] (Hope developers understand the meaning)"
Review_details_prequestsros: Salary on time.Working environment is really good, supportive seniors, colleagues and TLs.Own building and infrastructure is far good.Friday fun.Professionalism in work.Work pressure is very low. NegligibleGood for ladies, ontime leave 7pmLeave policies are good
Review_details_cons: Lets go through various departments :Data Mining :You'll learn the things within a month and after that you'll learn nothing. You'll surely regret after joining in this department.No usage of new technologies in data mining. Using outdated techniques.I'll suggest freshers and experienced both never join in this department. Join if you want to earn the experience letter.Development :Better compared to data mining.This department only belong to freshers, lots of things to explore. Experienced people will regret after joining it, you'll learn nothing, your skillset will become 0.Nothing for development, only maintenance.Testing :Only manual testing. High school student can also do the same thing that our testers do.Mobile development:Good for freshers and experienced both only if you are multi talented.You'll never get the projects which can get completed with the skills you have.You'll get the projects which need to be completed within 8 hrs.Management :Worst policies.

Review_details_prequestsros: To learn more on different new technology.Salary on time.Working environment is really good, supportive seniors, colleagues and TLs.Own building and infrastructure is far good.Friday fun.
Review_details_cons: nothing .Wishing All the best for future

Review_details_prequestsros: All employees are nice. They always help each other. Otherwise management is too worst. They never like to treat employee like an employee. Always treat with them like labour. If you are good in your work,you will always be therefor them. Never expect any kind response from other side.
Review_details_cons: Hire n Fire is very common these days. But if you expect any growth on behalf on your strengths. Then you are a fool. The only way to growth is switching the job. Otherwise you will be at same position for your whole life. They will hire a new one over you on a handsome package. But never want to see you at that position.

Review_details_prequestsros: 1. Salary on time (most probably in first 3 days of month).
Review_details_cons: The list goes will go on but I'll try to wrap in few points.1. Arrogant and stubborn CEO. He don't listen to anyone, literally no one. A fake demonstration of suggestion consideration is carried out at the end of every month. Fake means he don't give a damn what you speak for suggestion.2. No growth. As far as development is considered, they bring projects which merely has deadlines of max 40 days. Don't you ever think that you are going to get some deep knowledge because if you start searching new things, the deadline will cross your path. LAME!3. Poor evaluation of resources. No matter how much you are dedicated to your work, at the end of the day you will be surprised with your low appraisal (with the low I mean really very low).4. Poor appraisal policy. They make appraisal without discussing it with the employee and give unrealistic and impractical reasons on the performance issues.5. Moron HR. Sir, why are you here? HR has just one work which is to flatter CEO. He wags his tail and say whatever CEO say. Policies are poor. An employee is just in a strangling position when he resigns. No compensations or negotiations are carried out.

Review_details_prequestsros: Nothing positive in this company even though they will pay you nothing in term your caliber and salary is like peanuts and half salary at the end of month| CEO is showing big clap to data-mining but indirectly ruining them slowly.Dont join this company, you will regret later, Decide today
Review_details_cons: They pay you nothing and all the fresher and even though CEO look like fresher in term on knowledge of expertise. HR one of Full CHAPLOOS and crap and he decide business target and even though he dont know how to do sales. If he as what you can achieve then ask he has closed any deal till date in his life

No idea how to talk.No professnal skills.Not so much learning.The Qa team omg.Null knowledge.In company only create the pressure.

Review_details_prequestsros: Work Environment is too good.Team members are very supportive.TL's are very co-operative.Apart from work,there are fun activites every month & On occasions also.Salary always comes on time.Its a nice place & nice collegues to work with.
Review_details_cons: Nothing much, everything is good.

Review_title: "I you do not want to waste your time then don`t join here"
Review_details_prequestsros: 1-Only one pros is that salary comes in time except March and april.2-For fun Friday but only last Friday of month.
Review_details_cons: 1-If you want to leave early in notice period before completion of your notice period,they are followed Government policy to go to HR then manager (Who have no knowledge about PR skills),then go to TL,This process continue until you cannot complete 20 rounds ,then they tell ok now it may be possible and we maybe released before completion of your notice period.2-You cannot open any news and other link on google else you should captured by there internal use software and after that you should give a genuine region why you should open this3-You cannot update your self with latest technology bcz they don`t allow to open any link beyond your work.4-You cannot enter with your smartphone in your working area .5-After all the main thing is they are giving dinner package in night sift employee ,You can eat it what ever they will provide you either it is nasty or testy....

Review_details_prequestsros: Excellent company, stable projects, best part is the HR-Policies and the management !!!New 3 storey-building with top infrastructure !!
Review_details_cons: As a sernior, nothing that i really can point out..

Review_details_prequestsros: The work culture is very good.There is a lot of things for learningand the team an team is very supportive .The management and Hr is very friendly.The policy of company is very work good and benifical
Review_details_cons: nothing .Wishing All the best for future

Review_details_prequestsros: 1. No company grows so exponentially unless you perform very well in the current competitive markets. Loginworks growth was tremendously well since last 2-3 years.2. Good company for folks who look for challenging opportunities.3. Great opportunity for creative thinking folks.4. Direct client exposure to improve the client facing skills.5. Overall I am having wonderful experience working in Loginworks Softwares
Review_details_cons: As the company is growing, you may find some logistical challenges, but these are resolved quite proactively by management team.

Review_details_prequestsros: With Great Managment team, Positive approach with each employee working with this company.- Paid on time- Growth opportunity- Excellent work culture- Professional each team members- Employee Benefit- Work profession Similar to the CMMI5 level of companies worldwide.I would love to suggest all those job seekers come to join this company and get more advantage, I mention in above line.Thank you.
Review_details_cons: I didn't see a single point where I can comment.

Review_details_prequestsros: I joined Loginworks around 6 months ago and according do me it is one of the best company in which I have ever worked in.Be it in the terms of work culture or in the terms of salary or be it the management part.Every department is so well organised and the employees over here will make you feel like home.So,if you are planning to join this company,then you are in the right track of your career.
Review_details_cons: Every organisation has its merits and de-merits.Though its only been 6 months since I have joined this organisation and till now I have always seen positive side of it.So,as of now there is no side-effects. :)

Review_details_prequestsros: Not any Pros for new employee
Review_details_cons: 1. Agree for salary whatever you asked before interview.2. After clear all round, don't give you expected salary only 10-15% hike.3. HR is not approachable.

Review_details_prequestsros: Company owner is good and Rama Pati Sir is also good but rest of all is very bad
Review_details_cons: Never join this company, They are expected you have to stay daily in night.does't matter for there job timing they don't know.

Review_details_prequestsros: Recognizes deserving talent.The company offers a whole lot of opportunities to its employees.You can be innovative and do the different.

Review_details_prequestsros: cant think of any...but since i have to complete 20 word minimum thats why i wrote this.
Review_details_cons: this company is more about money making than development. not a very technology rich company.their recent obsession is some buldgy food ordering applcation...and mobile development has turned into a joke...they are simply into making money from food ordering application and not interested into any other mobile development work.Only few senior employees are controlling this place and made it in a way that people are doing any thing to get out of it.payment is not good...they just want work to be done by their employees.....anyhow.

Worst policy for appraisals.
